roleset.name: condemning

roles.note: arg2 given here, not included in the verb

example.name: Args 0, 1
example.text: One thing was for certain, there was a letter that Juliet Mitchell had written to Sterling Taber and it was damning to her in some way

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, damn-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls judgement-33.
